awyaja samajawadi nayakathwayak nathi thathu thula wiplawaye pradhana pudgalayan men ma wada palal lesa wiruddha paksha da eejipthu palaka prabhuwa wisin le waki lesa wireka kara atha. 2013 juli masaye di chandayen path wu janadhipathi ha muslim sahodarathwaye nayaka mohomang mursi pahakala militari kumanthranaya haraha balaya alla gath than patan, kayiro ha anekuth nagarawala dahas ganan ghathanaya kara athi militariya dasadahas ganan dena siragatha kota wadhabandhanawalata pamunuwa athi athara, kala usawiwalata wada wenas no wana nadu asim haraha eya wisin marana danduwamata niyama kala sirakaruwan siya gananak ghathanaya kirime yanthranaya wegawath kirima dan arambaa atha.
